title: Feeders don't get banned
body:
Love it. Unless you're a pro player like tyler 1 when riot actually notices it.

I played a game last night with a yasuo top on my team. He feed nasus 5 kills in 12 minutes. Then proceeds to run it down top over and over again.. dying like 15 times before the game was over.

But hell.. if you even so much as call someone a retard.. you'll get perma banned..

I think riot is a bunch of fucking cry babies liberals who think their players need a safe space. Don't punish the ones intentionally ruining the game but punish those who talk trash. Makes sense.. BTW I'm not banned I'm just saying.

replies.body:
What evidence is there that feeders (at least intentional ones) do not get banned?

If it is simply that you still see people feeding so they must not be banned, I would point out that we still see verbally abusive players every 3 games or so, despite the bans.

If it is because you are only seeing protests of innocence against chat related bans have also seen threads as recently as this morning posted by people who had been banned for intentional feeding.

I got suspended for that reason because some cringey dumbass on my team fed and i wanted to vent my frustrations to this terrible player who went 2/13 while our team carried that one dumbass but we ended up losing anyway because he fed kassadin
